## SendableEthersLiquity.transferBammCollateralGainToTrove() method

Transfer [collateral gain](./lib-base.bammdeposit.collateralgain.md) from Bamm Deposit to Trove.

**Signature:**

```typescript
transferBammCollateralGainToTrove(overrides?: EthersTransactionOverrides): Promise<SentEthersLiquityTransaction<CollateralGainTransferDetails>>;
```

## Remarks

The collateral gain is transfered to the Trove as additional collateral.
